name: ZipHR
description: KAMI Workforce is revolutionizing workforce management by offering innovative HR software technology and tailored people solutions that drive the future of work. “Kami” means “Us” in several Pacific languages, and represents our focus on people. We strive to provide effective digital workforce solutions that help our clients improve their people processes, maximize their workforce potential and enable their employees to better enjoy the workplace. We work closely with our clients to understand their unique challenges and deliver tailored solutions using innovative HR technology designed to improve efficiency of daily work activities, streamline operations and reduce costs. We are committed to being a trusted partner to help our clients achieve their business goals by investing in their most valuable asset – their people.

ShortDescription: Our tech-powered workforce management platform and tailored people solutions can help transform your HR processes, making it easier than ever to manage your team.
enhanced_description: ZipHR, operating as KAMI Workforce, provides innovative HR software technology and tailored people solutions designed to revolutionize workforce management and drive the future of work. As a tech-powered workforce management platform, it helps organizations transform their HR processes, making team management easier and more efficient. The platform encompasses a comprehensive suite of capabilities, including HR management, workforce management, time tracking, employee scheduling, payroll services, talent management, and recruiting. A key differentiator is its ability to offer critical financial assistance to employees through instant access to earned wages, providing essential financial flexibility. ZipHR focuses on improving people processes, maximizing workforce potential, and enabling employees to better enjoy the workplace, while also working closely with clients to deliver tailored solutions that improve efficiency, streamline operations, and reduce costs.
